text.text:
*Available Commands:*
• `/ec2` - Show this interactive menu
• `/ec2 list` - List all instances
• `/ec2 start <name>` - Start instance
• `/ec2 stop <name>` - Stop instance
• `/ec2 status <name>` - Get status
